name: World Recycling convention
content: The “World Recycling Convention” (Recycling Week 2023) meeting will take place in Dubai, UAE on November 01-03, 2023\. With participation from various enthusiastic researchers including recycling specialists, environmental engineers, recycling experts, wastewater treatment researchers, climate experts, scientists, environmentalists, industry delegates and other related professionals from the field to attend this distinguished event which will be based on the theme “Scientific & Innovative Ideas to Sustainable Recycling into the Future”.
